About us

We are constantly improving in the art of impressing and thrilling. Dance is our passion and our destiny.

A fantastic show is the result of years of training. Winning contests is recognition, but we don't stop there and continue to amaze with each of our performances.

"I started dancing at 3. Since then, the rhythms of oriental music have become the rhythm of my heart. Having learned from the dance legends, I'm happy to create the beauty of movement and pass on the art to a generation of my mentees. Dance is a part of the culture, so I'm proud to participate in projects and events of the state level and create amazing shows of different styles: from classical oriental dance to ballet and folk dance performance."

A 20-years dancing career lets me create spectacular choreography. If you want to diversify your party with something more than just a show — performing with a snake, or a sword, fire-eating, or broken glass dance is what you're looking for. For guests and the audience, it's a spectacular show. For Anastasia Show, it's a challenge to complete each dance better than the one before.
Whatever the dance you choose - you can be sure its implementation is world-class. However sophisticated you are in watching the show, we'll indeed find something to surprise you.

Discover a world of oriental luxury and polished dance professionalism with Anastasia Show.
Book Anastasia Show
get the chance to watch the world's best oriental dance at your party or event.
Book Anastasia Show
get the chance to watch the world's best oriental dance at your party or event.

Fall in love with oriental dance, and bring some magic into your party when watching Anastasia Show. Choreography by one of t he top Belly Dancers in the world will impress everyone

Anastasia Show expands the boundaries of mastery and imagination: a fantastic burlesque or ballet show, incendiary tabla solo, fascinating live fire dance (shamadan), LED show, or broken glass dance will take your breath away. And the traditional dance styles will create a unique atmosphere at your party: classical oriental dance, folklore styles of saidi and dabke, classical Russian or Armenian dance. We can include interacting with guests, like a welcoming ceremony or a belly dance master class, into the show for even more fusion with the choreography.

See all shows
And the dance has to be luxurious as well. That's why we renew the costumes in the show every six months - and they are always stunning and graceful.

Our Videos

Anastasia Show: the fascinating magic of exotic oriental dance by the world’s acknowledged professional.

  • Gold Medal Winner of the World Cup "Heart of Europe" (KROAT), classical solo adult professionals, Russia.
  • Silver medal winner of the world championship IDO (International Dance Organization) solo show adult professionals.
  • Judge of the United Russian Modern Dance Organization (ORTO) since 2017.
  • Member of the League of Oriental Dance Professionals organization since 2014.
  • Professional (certified) teacher-choreographer, Head of the Fitness, Yoga, and Dance Center "Grazia."
  • "Miss Russian LA" beauty contest winner (2019).
  • Winner and medalist of oriental dance championships: Bellydance of the Universe, Miami Bellydance Convention, Sahla Arabia Festival, Rakstar Bellydance Festival (USA).
